activities: Advantest receives European Personal Information regarding employees for employment related purposes. Advantest may also receive European Personal Information regarding customers for legitimate business purposes, including but not limited to: complete business transactions, communication back to the customer, updating the customer on services and products, personalizing our web site, and for receiving of marketing information.
corpofftitle1: Chief Administration Officer/Regional Information Security Officer
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for human resources data and the BBB EU Safe Harbor program for all other types of data.
